## getCertExpirationInfoData() function

Retrieve a certificate by Subject Name and return its expiration state and expiration date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCertExpirationInfoData(subjectName: string, businessDaysBuffer: number | undefined, now: Date, fetchCertExpirationInfo?: typeof getCertExpirationInfo): CertExpirationInfo;
```
